meanings.definition: A type of pants made by the Levi Strauss & Co. company.
meanings.sent1: I wore my favorite levis to the party.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of levis for school.
meanings.sent3: The levis were so comfortable, they felt like a second skin.
meanings.sent4: Her levis were like a shield against the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The iconic red tag on levis is instantly recognizable.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the Latin word 'levis', meaning light or smooth.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with objects that seemed levis in texture.
meanings.sent2: The artist used levis colors to create a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so fluffy and levis, it practically floated off the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as levis as a gentle breeze on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The fabric was soft and levis to the touch.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Levis greeted us warmly at the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The Levis family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent3: When asked about his last name, he joked that being a Levis made him feel 'light as a feather'.
meanings.sent4: The Levis name carried a sense of elegance and refinement.
meanings.sent5: The Levis family crest was proudly displayed in their home.
